name: PC Dial
tag_list: computers, repairs, hardware, support, telephony, broadband, workstations, anti-virus, security
overview:
A proactive IT support company for small to medium businesses and organisations. Based in Bristol, in the United Kingdom and with over 20 years of experience in the IT industry. We believe that IT support is often too complicated for what is actually required. PC Dial offers a unique method of IT support. Not only do we offer unlimited remote IT support for a fixed monthly fee, we also will proactivley manage your system and its security remotely as a part of our inclusive subscription.

IT support does not have to be confusing, complicated or expensive. PC dial offers stress free IT support for your company or organisation.

With technical operatives with experience ranging from small home computers and small to medium business setups to large corporate server infrastructures, we will always be able to tailor an uncomplicated IT support solution to you.

Unlike most IT support companies, we will not force upon you a specific solution, neither will we disregard your existing solution. We will always work with you, with your budget and with the sole rule of making sure your business is at the heart of any solution. We take away the hassle, allowing you to focus on running your business.

Each client receives their own personal account manager, the account manager is responsible for management of the account, services and computers subscribed. Each account manager provides a friendly face to talk through ideas and solutions with, while also having great knowledge on various areas of IT support.

Your account manager should be like a trusted member of your staff; reliable, trustworthy, efficient and friendly.
